data.name: Warface - Sniper Tournament Pack
data.detailed_description:
All a sniper could ask for to participate in the hottest PvP tournament yet. The set consists of full sniper gear and astounding primary weapon. All of the set pieces possess unique perks, adjusted to the PvP players’ needs.



Contains the following items:
  • Sniper Open Cup helmet - Decreases flash bang effect by 60%. Increases head protection by 20%. Detects enemy mines.
  • Open Cup shoes - Increases speed while sprinting by 5%. Increases sprint distance by 50%. Delays claymore activation by 3 sec.
  • Open Cup gloves - Increases accuracy by 10% and weapon selection/deselection speed by 20%.
  • Open Cup vest - Increases weapon reloading speed by 10%, provides 40% explosive protection, 20% melee damage protection and 10 pt absorption.
  • B-5000 - The B-5000 is a Russian bolt-action sniper rifle. The rifle was introduced in 2011 at an international exhibition of Russian weapons. It offers high accuracy and extreme penetration power. Not even strong protective gear will protect sufficiently against a direct hit.



This weapon comes with unique achievements for 10000 and 25000 kills.



All Open Cup gear is allowed in official tournaments. Put this on to make sure your enemy doesn’t get a chance to stand up to your skills or style!

data.short_description: This DLC contains the full, permanent sniper gear and the B-5000 Sniper rifle. All of the gear included in this DLC has been designed to deliver the best performance thinkable, delivered in-game with class-specific buffs and perks. Put it on and let nothing get in your way!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
